008 *******************************************************************************/
009package Ch07_MorphologicalFilters;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.gui.GenericDialog;
013import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
014import ij.process.ByteProcessor;
015import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
016import imagingbook.common.ij.GuiTools;
017import imagingbook.common.ij.IjUtils;
018import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryClosing;
019import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryDilation;
020import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryErosion;
021import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryMorphologyFilter;
022import imagingbook.common.morphology.BinaryOpening;
023
024/**
025 * <p>
026 * ImageJ plugin implementing a binary morphology filter with an arbitrary
027 * structuring element that can be interactively specified by the user.
028 * See Sec. 7.2 of [1] for additional details.
029 * This plugin works on 8-bit grayscale images only.
030 * Zero-value pixels are considered background, all other pixels
031 * are foreground. Different to ImageJ's built-in morphological
032 * operators, this implementation does not incorporate the current display 
033 * lookup-table (LUT).
034 * </p> 
035 * <p>
036 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An Algorithmic
037 * Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
038 * </p>
039 * @author WB
040 * @version 2022/01/24
041 */
042public class Bin_Morphology_Free implements PlugInFilter {
043        
044        public static enum OpType {
045                Dilate, Erode, Open, Close;
046        }
047
048        /** Operation type (dilation, erosion, opening, closing). */
049        public static OpType Operation = OpType.Dilate;
050        /** Width and height of the structuring element. */
051        public static final int Size = 4;
052        /** Display the structuring element as a binary image. */
053        public static boolean ShowStructuringElement = false;
054        
055        private static boolean[] freeStructure = new boolean[Size * Size];
056        static { // initially set the center element
057                freeStructure[(Size * Size) / 2] = true;
058        }
059
060        @Override
061        public int setup(String arg, ImagePlus imp) {
062                return DOES_8G;
063        }
064
065        @Override
066        public void run(ImageProcessor orig) {
067                if (!showDialog()) {
068                        return;
069                }
070                
071                byte[][] H = makeStructureElement(freeStructure);
072                ByteProcessor bp = (ByteProcessor) orig;
073                
074                BinaryMorphologyFilter filter = null;
075                switch(Operation) {
076                case Close:     
077                        filter = new BinaryClosing(H); break;
078                case Dilate:
079                        filter = new BinaryDilation(H); break;
080                case Erode:
081                        filter = new BinaryErosion(H); break;
082                case Open:
083                        filter = new BinaryOpening(H); break;
084                }
085                
086                filter.applyTo(bp);
087                
088                if (ShowStructuringElement) {
089                        ByteProcessor pH = IjUtils.toByteProcessor(H);
090                        pH.invertLut();
091                        pH.setMinAndMax(0, 1);
092                        ImagePlus iH = new ImagePlus("H", pH);
093                        iH.show();
094                        GuiTools.zoomExact(iH, 10);
095                }
096        }
097
098        private boolean showDialog() {
099                GenericDialog gd = new GenericDialog(this.getClass().getSimpleName());
100                String[] labels = makeFilterLabels();
101
102                gd.addCheckboxGroup(Size, Size, labels, freeStructure);
103                gd.addEnumChoice("Operation", Operation);
104                gd.addCheckbox("Show structuring element", ShowStructuringElement);
105                gd.showDialog();
106                if (gd.wasCanceled())
107                        return false;
108
109                for (int i = 0; i < Size * Size; i++) {
110                        freeStructure[i] = gd.getNextBoolean();
111                }
112                Operation = gd.getNextEnumChoice(OpType.class);
113                ShowStructuringElement = gd.getNextBoolean();
114                return true;
115        }
116
117        private byte[][] makeStructureElement(boolean[] structure) {
118                byte[][] kernel = new byte[Size][Size];
119                int i = 0;
120                for (int v = 0; v < Size; v++) {
121                        for (int u = 0; u < Size; u++) {
122                                if (structure[i])
123                                        kernel[v][u] = 1;
124                                else
125                                        kernel[v][u] = 0;
126                                i++;
127                        }
128                }
129                return kernel;
130        }
131
132        private String[] makeFilterLabels() {
133                String[] labels = new String[Size * Size];
134                for (int i = 0; i < labels.length; i++) {
135                        labels[i] = " ";
136                }
137                labels[(Size * Size) / 2] = "x";
138                return labels;
139        }
140
141}
